capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Neville Longbottom's family history and it turns out he comes from a really long line of pure-blood wizards. His ancestors were all part of the wizarding world for centuries, which is pretty fascinating if you ask me.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville's lineage is indeed quite impressive. I mean, being a pure-blood wizard from the Gaunt family is no easy feat. His heritage has definitely played a significant role in shaping who he is today.
